1. Start with 500 µL serum or plasma.

2. Bring up volume to fill ultracentrifuge tube \(2.3-2.5 mL) with PBS.
  3.
Centrifuge for 70 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
Discard supernatant and resuspend pellet in PBS to fill ultracentrifuge tube.

Centrifuge for 70 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
  6.

Resuspend pellet in 50 µL PBS and store at -80°C, or
  8.
Proceed to miRNeasy RNA isolation by adding 700 µL
